attributes.action: World trade santion against China until it inproves it's human rights in Tibet ect.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Europe and America stop all new investment and trade with China until
it implements  human rights!!

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/BycottChina/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
